overview: Byeong-seo, who works as a boom operator at a Chinese movie site, is unable to concentrate on work due to a breakup notice from her girlfriend in Korea. Bingbing, a kind policewoman, helps Byeong-seo, who is in trouble after dropping the boom under the wall, and she guides Byeong-seo to her favorite dumpling shop. There, he meets Sun Ying, who has a crush on Bing Bing, and Bing Bing and Sun Ying develop feelings for each other due to Byeong Seo's mistake. A love story between Korean and Chinese young people who are seemingly different. (Source: The 18th Bucheon International Fantastic Film Festival)
title: Sounds Good
